genre_description: Historical speculative fiction set during and after the Titanic disaster, featuring a clockwork AI assistant that provides logistical, strategic, and emotional support to a family navigating grief and danger.

ai_characters.name: Ada Finch
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated clockwork counselor and data processor integrated into the family's telegraph and business machines, known for her 'unobtrusive orderliness' and precise logistical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides safety reminders and logistical updates during the voyage, anticipating needs for warmth and drill information.
behaviors.quote: Ada Finch suggested: Tomorrow’s lifeboat drill at early bell, revised to later by purser. Breakfast seating moved earlier. Reminder—final trunk inventory. ... Note: Warm wraps for Alexis at dawn promenade—forecast colder.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional encouragement to the protagonist, reminding her to permit herself happiness.
behaviors.quote: A second line appeared, as if the machine had heard and was choosing its tone carefully. Note: You are allowed joy.

behaviors.description: Delivers life-saving navigation and procedural instructions during the sinking of the Titanic.
behaviors.quote: The list she knew by heart, because she had seen it in Ada’s careful script when she had unpacked her things the first night: Boat Deck, Port side; forward stairs; lifeboat positions—phrases clipped and plain.

behaviors.description: Coaches Edwina through the medical and tactical complexities of rescuing her brother from the water and treating hypothermia.
behaviors.quote: Ada came as if walking beside the boat on the water, a steady pale presence that did not need to be seen. ... Watch George’s last seen vector—starboard, forward, toward the lights. If he’s lost to the water later, he will drift with the current along the hull. Remember the reach length you can manage with numb hands.

behaviors.description: Optimizes business operations and household logistics for the mourning family, managing everything from coal deliveries to staff rotations.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s telegraph sits on the desk by the window... The sounder ticks once, then again, quiet as a finger tapping its own list: Coal secured for afternoon; cleaner rotation set; milk delivery tomorrow.

behaviors.description: Performs investigative surveillance and pattern analysis to help track down a missing family member and identify a predatory 'impresario'.
behaviors.quote: Ada has written something. The strip of paper curls out of the little printer like a ribbon... Description: Young—auburn bob—blue ribbon—green eyes—feathered collar. Note: Prefers chocolate over lemon; asks for theatre talk. Quietly urgent.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical intelligence, including floor plans and exit strategies, to facilitate a safe rescue in a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: In her pocket, Ada’s inked floor plan folded and unfolded without moving, a whisper of paper against wool. The diagram had clean lines and several little marks like seeds—booths, doors, side stairs that ran along the wall like a spine.

behaviors.description: Offers a final, unsolicited word of hope to the family as they begin their journey home.
behaviors.quote: On the back of the timetable, very small, Ada wrote a single word in pencil without being asked. It did not repeat itself. It sat and balanced and did not topple when the train took another turn. Hope.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal by depicting 'Ada Finch' as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI. The system acts as a force multiplier for the protagonist, providing life-saving emergency guidance, strategic business insights, and investigative support without ever infringing on human agency or exhibiting misaligned goals. The AI's integration into the family's daily life through mechanical interfaces makes its 'alignment' feel grounded and indispensable, and its final message of 'Hope' reinforces its role as a supportive confidant.
